posts.message:
دى ال Slides الخاصة بال Talk بتاعتى اللى قدمتها هنا فى المكسيك بعنوان Web Application Security on Fire، مفيدة جداً للناس اللى حابة تفهم أنواع الثغرات وهتبقى مفيدة اكتر لمطورى PHP، استمتعوا. #ثغرة_وحكاية #Information_Security #WebApplicationSecurity #Bugs #Vulnerabilities
­
اللينك لو مش هتقدر تفتح ال Slides نفسها: (https://goo.gl/EAy9GW)
­
This is my talk slides which I presented here in Mexico city, titled "Web Application Security on Fire". It is very useful for all who want to understand the types of vulnerabilities and it's more useful for the PHP developers.
­
The link if you can't open it from the thumbnails: (https://goo.gl/EAy9GW)

posts.message: is there is a way to do UPNP through java script  ?  i have been searching about this but the only implementations i could find ( like this one https://richtr.github.io/plug.play.js ) are dependent on navigator.getNetworkServices API  which apparently is only supported by opera now

Whether or not you've heard of Qalb (the Arabic programming language, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qalb_(programming_language) ) I think this is a great article about the implications of all programming languages being in English http://mic.com/articles/130331/this-arabic-programming-language-shows-how-computers-revolve-around-the-western-world#.Slg9hkfVZ

posts.caption: igvita.com
posts.description: LevelDB combines the SSTable, MemTable a number of processing conventions to create a fast, open-source database engine. LevelDB is now embedded in WebKit (IndexDB), but you can also easily embed it in your own application!
